title: RIOT EXPLAIN TO ME Y I DIDNT GET AN S??????
body: so i just played a game as shaco and went 18/2/11, so y do i only get an A+? fix your system

replies.body:
Telecasterdude wrote up a good article that provides a bit more information about the Champion Mastery system. Check it out here:

http://kb.leaguevolunteers.com/gameplay:champion_mastery
update: just played a game with another shaco who got an s for 22/15/10.....
In order to get an s, you need to focus on more then just kills. People thinks its mainly bout kills but its mainly bout cs and objectives.
